name: Leprechaun's Pot
description:
Collect the coins and feed them to the left side of the rainbow. The rainbow will gradually fade, but the more you feed it, the more it will last. Created for Trijam #113. The theme of the jam was "rainbow".

Third-party assets used:

Soundtrack: Lurking Sloth, by Alexander Nakarada, CC0, obtained from https://freepd.com/comedy.php

Coin hit sound: CC0, from https://freesound.org/people/joseph.larralde/sounds/405426/

Coin collection sound: coin5.ogg from Kenney Game Assets 2 version 21, CC0, from https://kenney.itch.io/kenney-game-assets-2/devlog/68686/content-update-version-...
